trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around July 11th 2008
Summary: Two round shaped lights heading southwest the stop instantly and head in the othe direction
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from the store with my brothers. I was arround 14 years old the time.We was at a corner from the street my house was on. I looked up and saw two glowing objects heading southwest. They slowed down then headed in the opposite direction. It made no turns at all. I was shock because i knew it could not be a a plane of helicopter. It was like a car driving forward the slowing down to back up. I turned my head to show my brothers but as they was about to look the two objects were gone. It was my second ufo sighting since I was little.
